SPM12 must be installed to compile the Matlab code, but is not needed to run the 
compiled code. Its source is not included in the code repository or in the container.

SPM12 (r7771)
    LICENCE_SPM12.txt
    https://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/
    https://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/download/restricted/eldorado/spm12.zip
